title: Optometry Boards Prep
description:
Are you taking the NBEO® Optometry Boards? Use "Optometry Boards" to prepare for and pass your Optometry Boards Part 1. Here's just a few ways how you will benefit and succeed from this app and score higher on your NBEO® Part 1 Optometry Boards:

■ Master the NBEO® Part 1 Optometry Boards with Video Crash Courses, Flashcards & Study Guides
       + 10 Hours of Video Crash Courses to help you save study time on the subjects tested on the Optometry Boards
       + Learn quicker and faster!
       + Memorize commonly tested questions, facts and concepts from over 20,000 NBEO® Part 1 Optometry Boards flashcards
       + Study Guides & Cheat Sheets for the NBEO® 

■ Simulate the NBEO® Part 1 Optometry Boards Exam
       + Rehearse the NBEO® Optometry Boards by emulating the same look and feel
       + Sharpen your test taking skills, perfect your time management, enhance your accuracy and bolster your confidence
       + Check your answers after each question using "Practice Mode"

■  Large Arsenal of Optometry Board Test Questions (with Explanations)
       + Challenge yourself to 1000+ newly added Optometry Board Questions Prep for the NBEO® Part 1
       + Access bonus tests for Anatomy, Biochemistry, Microbiology, Pathology, Physiology, Pharmacology (over 3000 questions)
       + Be more ready and prepared before you get to the test center. The actual test will then be a cakewalk for you.

■  Improve your test skills
       + Boost your time management, confidence and accuracy for your NBEO® Part 1 Optometry Boards
       + Catapult and boost your Optometry Board Scores instantly so you can pass!

■  Learn from detailed explanations
       + Absorb commonly tested facts and concepts through 3000+ detailed explanations for the Optometry Boards so you don't make costly mistakes on the NBEO® Part 1 Optometry Boards

■  Estimate your NBEO® Optometry Board scores
       + Predict and estimate your NBEO ® scores
       + Receive your estimated NBEO® Scores after each test

■  Pinpoint your weaknesses
       + Generate comprehensive analysis reports to find areas where you can improve your NBEO® Scores

■  Receive Automatic updates
       + You'll never be left with an outdated version. Yay!

■  Access Anytime Anywhere

■  Pass your NBEO® Optometry Boards
       + Heart us after you conquer your Optometry Boards. You'll be one step closer to becoming a licensed optometrist!

NBEO® is a federally registered mark owned by The National Board of Examiners in Optometry, Inc. (the “Board”). This app is not affiliated, sponsored or endorsed by the Board.

summary: Pass your NBEO® Part 1 with Videos, Flashcards, Study Guides & Tests
